last_accessed_at.description: The most recent timestamp when the file was accessed

BaseEntityOwner.description:
The user / organization owning this entity.

Note: Owner implicitly has access to the entity regardless of ACLs.

BaseEntityAcl.description: Access control list (ACL) for an entity. Defines sharing access to external orgs or users.

FileFolderId.description: Generated uuid for a file folder

FileFolderItem.description: A file folder with identifiers and timestamps

slug.description:
Full slug for the folder. Format depends on collection type:
- User collection: `_system_files_collection_{entity_uuid}_{user_id}:{collection_name}`
  Example: `_system_files_collection_3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6_10234:documents`
- Global collection: `_system_files_collection_schema_{schema_slug}:{collection_name}`
  Example: `_system_files_collection_schema_opportunity:templates`

parents.description:
Array of parent folder slugs, empty array if top-level folder. Format depends on collection type:
- User collection: `_system_files_collection_{entity_uuid}_{user_id}`
  Example: `["_system_files_collection_3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6_10234"]`
- Global collection: `_system_files_collection_schema_{schema_slug}`
  Example: `["_system_files_collection_schema_opportunity"]`

starred.description: Whether the folder is starred / favorited

created_at.description: Timestamp when the folder was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the folder was last updated

ErrorObject.description: A generic error returned by the API

status.description: The HTTP status code of the error

parents.description: Array of parent folder slugs, empty array if top-level folder

starred.description: Whether the folder is starred / favorited
